name: 4-LEGGED-HEROINE
description:
4-LEGGED-HEROINE is a short-game inspired by the endless runner genre, set in a reality inspired by the COVID19 situation. We join Agent Doggo, a St. Bernard immune to the virus, in her mission of delivering medical supplies. 

This project was conceived as part of the Coronavirus GameJam but didn't make it in time. However, the development team  decided to release it anyways.
